articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground
						
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Ryongjong Fish Breeding Ground Monday.
					 Being briefed on the fact that soldier-builders built a modern large fish breeding ground in a short span of time, members of the corps went round with keen interest fish ponds, protein feed producer and other places.
					
					 At the end of the visit Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here, who is doyen of the corps, said:
					
					 I was deeply moved to see the fish breeding ground furnished with ultra-modern equipment. Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il is paying deep attention to improving the standard of people's living and devoting strenuous efforts to it. I wish the Korean people great success in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Military attache of the Cuban embassy here Leonardo Perez Mesa said that the visit offered an opportunity to have a better understanding of the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il who is devoting himself to the promotion of wellbeing of the people, adding that the Korean people under his guidance will build a thriving nation in the near future.

articles.title: Songs Dedicated to WPK
articles.content:
Songs Dedicated to WPK
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A lot of songs have been created in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea this year when the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was celebrated with Kim Jong Il reelected as its general secretary.
					 Among them are such songs reflecting all the people's praise of the WPK as "Glory to Our Great Party," "Party Is the Leader's Embrace," "I Song of the Party" and "The Youth, Advance Following the Party."
					
					 The song "Glory to Our Great Party" highlighted in October performances celebrating the WPK anniversary mirrors the feelings of the Korean people and army absolutely trusting in the WPK and deeply revering it. 
					
					 "Party Is the Leader's Embrace" was created in March when the Korean people were bringing about a fresh upsurge in the building of a thriving nation, in response to the joint calls issued by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					Such songs as "Fascination and Reverence" and "I Song of the Party" came into being in June when the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was observed and "The Youth, Advance Following the Party" in September when a historic conference of the WPK took place.
					
					 The new songs inspire the people with the belief that the country will become more prosperous and the people will enjoy a happy life under the leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: New Mushroom Cultivation Technologies Developed
articles.content:
New Mushroom Cultivation Technologies Developed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Mushroom Research Institute of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed new reasonable technologies and methods of mushroom cultivation.
					 The technologies of cultivating such mushrooms as Lentinus edodes and Agaricus subfunereus and the technology and method of spore culture and breeding have proved effective in some cooperative farms and mushroom producers.
					
					 The Lentinus edodes growing technology makes it possible to gather mushrooms only scores of days after spores were injected into timber waste, increasing the harvest by 30 percent.
					
					 The Chosan and Anbyon Mushroom factories, Chonnae Soy and Bean Paste Factory and many other mushroom bases have introduced the technology of spore culture and the method of stage-and-stage spore breeding suitable for different strains and seasons. 
					
					 A mushroom growing technology proper to the countryside has been applied not only to farms but to houses.
					
					 The research institute has also made foodstuffs and drinks with mushrooms.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Wholly to Blame for Escalated Tension and Danger of War
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Wholly to Blame for Escalated Tension and Danger of War 
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities, its followers, are the arch criminals disturbing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are escalating confrontation and tension through ceaseless moves to ignite a war, seriously disturbing peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces perpetrated a grave military provocation while frantically staging war exercises for aggression against the DPRK in the area very close to its territory despite its sincere efforts to defuse the tension on the peninsula and improve the inter-Korean relations. This clearly proves that it was none other than these forces who escalated the confrontation and tension on the peninsula and brought the danger of a nuclear war to it.
					
					 It is attributable to the U.S. hostile policy of aggression towards the DPRK that the peace and security on the peninsula are exposed to a grave threat.
					
					 The vicious moves of the U.S. and the south Korean ruling forces in league with it to start a war of aggression against the DPRK are the main factor of driving the situation on the peninsula to a serious catastrophe.
					
					 The military provocation committed by the puppet forces in the waters around Yonphyong Island was by no means accidental.
					
					 It was part of the adventurous scenario to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK which has long been in the making and a deliberate and premeditated move to derail the process for improving the inter-Korean relations and do harm to the DPRK by force of arms at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. has frantically stepped up the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK, while staying in south Korea for several decades. The aim sought by the U.S. is to keep Korea indefinitely divided and put the whole of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia under its unchallenged control with south Korea as its military base and springboard. Prompted by such sinister aim, the U.S. is noisily talking about the fictitious threat from someone while posing a constant military threat to the DPRK under the pretext of coping with it. 
					
					 The warlike forces of the U.S. and south Korea are driving the situation to an uncontrollable catastrophe under the pretext of the recent incident in a bid to impose a nuclear war disaster on the Korean nation without hesitation.
					
					 This is, however, a serious miscalculation. The warlike forces will never go scot-free while making desperate efforts to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK on this land at any cost.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Warmongers' Combined Naval Maneuvers Flayed
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Warmongers' Combined Naval Maneuvers Flayed
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers kicked off large-scale combined naval maneuvers targeted the DPRK together with the United States in waters of the West Sea of Korea on Nov. 28 in the wake of the serious armed provocation committed by them in the territorial waters of the DPRK side in the same sea recently. Involved in this saber-rattling which will last till December 1 are naval warships of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces including their nuclear-powered carrier George Washington, cruisers and destroyers and huge puppet armed forces including destroyers, patrol craft, escort craft, logistic support ships and anti-submarine planes.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The dangerous saber-rattling kicked off by the south Korean puppet forces, supported by the above-said nuclear carrier, far from drawing a lesson from the recent reckless provocation is a blatant challenge to the demand of the Korean nation and the international community for immediately defusing the tension prevailing on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring peace and a deliberate and premeditated move to push the acute situation to the brink of an all-out war at any cost.
					
					 This is, in fact, as reckless as adding fuel to the fire.
					
					 It is in pursuance of the carefully worked out scenario that the south Korean puppet forces started the dangerous combined naval exercises together with the U.S. in the wake of their grave armed provocation in the West Sea of Korea. The above-said naval maneuvers kicked off by the warmongers at home and abroad go to prove that the puppet forces' military provocation in the territorial waters of the DPRK side was no more than a prelude to the operation to escalate the moves for an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are making an uproar over "provocation" from someone and the like in a desperate bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK and escalate the international racket to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 However, the U.S. and the puppet warmongers' escalating war moves in the West Sea of Korea patently prove that they are the heinous provocateurs and arch criminals threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can browbeat and pressurize someone by getting the nuclear carrier involved in the war maneuvers.
					
					 They would be well advised to properly understand the will and mettle of the DPRK to wipe out the enemy and stop going reckless.

articles.title: Drive for Pushing Back Frontiers of Science and Technology Called for
articles.content:
Drive for Pushing Back Frontiers of Science and Technology Called for
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is sure to emerge a victor in the drive for building a thriving nation by pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology as long as it is inspired by the firm determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to put Kim Il Sung's Korea on the top of the world and there are a powerful foundation of the self-supporting economy consolidated by dint of Songun and a large contingent of heroic creators trained by the WPK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article:
					
					 The ongoing drive to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology represents an all-out offensive underway in all fields for building an economic power and a struggle sure to triumph thanks to the long standing self-supporting Juche-based industry and its tremendous potential.
					
					 The DPRK is dashing ahead on the orbit of cutting-edge science and technology. Nuclear fusion technology which draws global attention and bio-engineering and Nano technologies have been positively developed in the DPRK and its economy has been successfully put on a Juche and modern basis. 
					
					 The DPRK has produced a great many heroes and heroines meeting the high need for pushing back the frontiers of cutting-edge science and technology. 
					
					The standard-bearers in the above-said drive are pace-setters in the era advancing with keys to leap forward in all the fields in their hands by learning from the creative world of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, personnel strong in faith and will as they are transparent in the spirit of national self-esteem and men of wide knowledge who take the lead in translating the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and technology into reality.
					
					 It is an immortal exploit of the WPK that it has trained a large contingent of heroic creators in the crucible of the drive to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.
					
					 The article calls on everybody to intensify the above-mentioned drive by aiming high, not resting on his laurels, and thus fully demonstrate the stamina of Songun Korea dynamically advancing to attain the world level.

articles.title: Pomminryon Calls for Dynamic Movement for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Pomminryon Calls for Dynamic Movement for Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) at a press conference held on Nov. 23 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the formation of the organization called for waging a more dynamic movement for Korea's reunification.
					 He recalled that since its formation Pomminryon has worked hard to realize strong solidarity among the south, the north and overseas sides and achieve national independence and reunification.
					
					 Visits, contacts, cooperation and exchange had been brisk between the south and the north since the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration but the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime threw a stumbling block in the way of the reunification movement, he noted.
					
					 Pointing out that the South Headquarters of Pomminryon has waged a strenuous struggle to pull down the barrier of division, drive foreign forces out of south Korea and achieve the great unity of the nation despite the authorities' brutal suppression, he declared that the South Headquarters would as ever wage a dynamic struggle to open up a landmark phase in the June 15 era of independent reunification.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Richard Stenberg, chairman of the Swedish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on Nov. 24 in support of the self-defensive measure taken by the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 The statement strongly denounced the provocation made by the south Korean puppet authorities in the territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 The Swedish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea fully supports the self-defensive measures taken by the KPA to beat back the aggression moves of the provocateurs and defend the country, it said.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK, too, in its statement on Nov. 24 extended full support to the Korean people who are responding to the military provocation being made by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces in the West Sea of Korea with the drive to build a thriving nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK which has great and heroic people will only win in the showdown with the imperialists, amid the support from the world progressive people, it stressed.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Admired
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Suk Admired
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung issued a bulletin on Nov. 16 on the occasion of the 93rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine.
					The bulletin edited articles under various titles, carrying photos of the President, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 In an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Suk, heroine of the Korean people" the bulletin noted that she, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, devotedly safeguarded Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese war and brought up Kim Jong Il to be the sun for brilliant future of Juche Korea.
					
					 The Korean people will always remember Kim Jong Suk who performed great feats for the revolutionary cause, the bulletin said, adding that her exploits for the country and the nation will remain forever.
					
					 The bulletin also carried articles on the successful conclusion of the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the WPK's 65-year-long history of victory and glory.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
articles.content:
Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
 Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China published the November issue of its magazine "Paektu-Halla."
					The magazine carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It edited news that Kim Jong Il received a high-ranking military delegation of the People's Republic of China headed by Guo Boxiong, he attended the mass meeting marking the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front and he laid wreaths before the grave of Mao Anying and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the CPV in Hoechang County together with secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and members of the Party Central Military Commission.
					
					 Given in the magazine are accounts of celebration events held by the association and organizations under it including meetings, art performances and film shows on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK.
					
					 The magazine conveys accounts round-table talks, art performances and receptions held by officials of the association and Koreans living in Shenyang City together with former fighters of the CPV on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the CPV's entry into the Korean front.
					
					 The magazine also carried "DPRK's accession to nuclear deterrent was entirely just," a KCNA commentary, and "Let us meet challenge of anti-reunification forces and usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity," a statement issued by Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the above-said general association.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Days Celebrated in Various Contries
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Days Celebrated in Various Contries
Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- A seminar on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was held in South Africa and a round-table talk and a show on the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" in Russia on November 22 to mark the 19th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present at the events were personages of different circles and popular masses of those countries.
					
					 Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work, stressing that he is the only leader who gives importance to preserving the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction.
					
					 To preserve the Juche character and national character at present is a key to achieving prosperity and progress of each country and nation, he said, describing the work of Kim Jong Il as a political great program which the world progressives should regard as guidelines and textbook in building an independent state.
					
					 The first vice-president of a company of the Russian Technical Glass Research Institute and other speakers praised the might of the DPRK's single-minded unity and the invincibility of the KPA and expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK will win in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists under the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					Los artistas de esta banda interpretaron las piezas de diferentes generos, incluyendo la sinfonia en serie "Himno al Partido", el concierto para piano "!Que prospere la patria!" y las musicas orquestales "Abundante cosecha en campos de Chongsan" y "Un soldado con oidos a las espigas de arroz que se agitan".
					
					En esta ocasion, ellos cantaron en tono patetico las inmortales proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente, quien abrio la era de prosperidad en el territorio patrio mediante su entusiasta e incansable direccion, y mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de cumplir a toda costa la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo siempre con fidelidad al Dirigente.
					
					Terminada la funcion artistica, el Dirigente felicito los exitos de los ejecutantes respondiendo a la aclamacion hospitalaria de estos y espectadores.
					
					La sinfonia en serie "Himno al Partido", arreglada y dirigida por Jang Ryong Sik, Artista del Pueblo y director en jefe de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional, deviene otra obra monumental que representa la epoca del Songun, dijo el Dirigente y agradecio al colectivo de creadores evaluando altamente su exito de haber creado y completado esa excelente obra que muestra emotivamente en escenas epicas la gloriosa historia del PTC.
					
					El colectivo de creadores, incluyendo al director, creo esa sinfonia en serie conveniente a la idiosincrasia usando su gran capacidad, y, en particular, manifesto energicamente con peculiar metodo de direccion la grandeza de la elegante y delicada musica coreana, subrayo y enfatizo que todos los creadores y artistas deben aprender el emprendedor y entusiasta estilo y actitud de creacion de ellos que contribuyen activamente a crear y describir la obra maestra de la epoca que prefiere el pueblo coreano y hace aporte a la revolucion.
					
					Dado que la musica es una ciencia del hombre, hay que satisfacer la demanda cultural de nuestro pueblo al describir con rica y hermosa interpretacion artistica su noble mundo espiritual que se eleva en el transcurso de la epoca, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar la sinfonia autoctona de Corea.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional elevaran a una etapa mas alta su nivel de creacion y arreglo musical y sus talentos de ejecucion para ser verdaderos creadores y firmes defensores de la cultura y arte socialistas.
					
					Disfrutaron el espectaculo tambien Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del CC del PTC, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central (CMC) del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la CMC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC, secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, y otros funcionarios directivos del partido y el ejercito.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena el ejercicio maritimo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena el ejercicio maritimo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Los belicistas surcoreanos, que incurrieron hace poco en la grave provocacion militar en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el Mar Oeste de Corea, iniciaron a partir del dia 28 junto con Estados Unidos el ejercicio maritimo conjunto de gran dimension contra la segunda. En esta maniobra, que se extendera hasta el primero de diciembre en esa zona maritima, se movilizan el portaaviones nuclear norteamericano "George Washington", el crucero, el destructor y otros buques de guerra de EE.UU. y colosales fuerzas armadas del ejercito titere surcoreano, incluyendo el destructor, la corbeta, el buque de escolta, el barco de apoyo militar y el avion antisubmarino.
					  En lugar de sacar la leccion del incidente armado de la isla Yonphyong, los titeres surcoreanos comenzaron esa maniobra incorporando hasta el portaaviones nuclear norteamericano en desafio a la demanda de la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional de relajar pronto la tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y defender la paz.
					
					  Por lo tanto, el presente ejercicio militar da lo mismo que echar gasolina al fuego, es decir, es una locura para llevar a la fase de guerra total la ya muy tirante situacion.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					  El polemico entrenamiento parte del guion minuciosamente trazado para desatar la guerra total en la Peninsula Coreana mediante la escalada de acciones belicas que comiencen por la provocacion militar sobre las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas estan desesperados para manchar la imagen de la RPDC y recrudecer en la arena internacional la campana para aplastarla mintiendo que ella es "provocadora". Pero, la escalada de acciones belicas de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos en el Mar Oeste de Corea demuestra claramente que son ellos mismos los provocadores y amenazadores de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					  Estarian muy equivocados si ellos intentan asustar y presionar a alguien con portaaviones.
					
					  Ellos deben actuar con prudencia justipreciando la voluntad e impetu de la RPDC de aniquilar a los enemigos.

articles.title: EE.UU. y autoridades surcoreanas agravan tension y peligro de guerra
articles.content:
EE.UU. y autoridades surcoreanas agravan tension y peligro de guerra
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual fechado 29, el periodico Rodong Sinmun revela que Estados Unidos y sus seguidoras autoridades surcoreanas son los autores principales de perturbacion de paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Corea, y continua:
					Persiguiendo unicamente la confrontacion y tension, ellos violan seriamente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana con sus incesantes provocaciones encaminadas a la guerra.
					
					Pese a los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por relajar la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas, los titeres surcoreanos cometieron hace poco una grave provocacion militar al cabo de su frenetico ejercicio militar realizado en las mismas narices de la RPDC.
					
					Este hecho demuestra claramente que son ellos mismos los autores que agravan el enfrentamiento y la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y traen el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Hoy en dia, la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana se ven gravemente amenazadas en lo principal debido a la agresiva politica hostil de Estados Unidos sobre la RPDC.
					
					Las siniestras acciones provocativas anti-RPDC de las fuerzas gobernantes del Sur de Corea, que se confabulan con EE.UU., constituyen el factor principal que empuja la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase mas catastrofica.
					
					La reciente provocacion militar en la isla Yonphyong no es un incidente casual sino la continuacion de las maniobras para la guerra contra el Norte comenzadas mucho antes y un acto premeditado para impedir la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y aplastar militarmente a la RPDC.
					
					Durante varias decadas, EE.UU. vino preparandose para la guerra de agresion a la RPDC tras ocupar el suelo surcoreano.
					
					La meta del imperio es dividir para siempre a Corea en dos partes y tomar la hegemonia sobre toda la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico utilizando el Sur de Corea como su base militar y trampolin.
					
					De ahi que EE.UU. chantajea militarmente en todo momento a la RPDC bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la inexistente "amenaza" proveniente de la segunda.
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos usan el incidente de la isla Yonphyong para llevar la situacion a la fase irremediablemente desastrosa y hacer sufrir a la nacion coreana las calamidades de guerra nuclear.
					
					Esos equivocados deben darse cuenta de que ellos no podran salir ilesos tampoco de la eventual guerra de agresion a la RPDC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena discurso del representante japones ante ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena discurso del representante japones ante ONU
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En el pleno del 65o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU el representante japones insistio en que su pais merece la calidad de miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU porque ya pidio "perdon" por sus crimenes del pasado e hizo aporte al "mantenimiento de la paz y seguridad internacionales".
					Este discurso resulta un disparate que se burla del mundo e invierte la verdad.
					
					Asi senalo el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 28 y continuo:
					
					Sobran los datos reveladores de que Japon utilizo todas las artimanas para encubrir y aliviar sus crimenes perpetrados durante la agresion a otros paises en el siglo pasado y liberarse de su responsabilidad, lejos de reconocerlos como crimenes peores y tomar el camino de disculparse e indemnizar aunque tardiamente.
					
					Como es posible que tal pais actue sin ninguna pena en los escenarios politicos internacionales y se le antoje hasta la membresia permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU?
					
					El "aporte" a la paz y seguridad internacionales, de que habla tanto Japon, no es otro que el avance al extranjero de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y sus operaciones en ultramar que posibilito bajo el pretexto de la "cooperacion con la ONU por el mantenimiento de la paz".
					
					Este pais isleno pretende ser miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad no para contribuir al desarrollo sano o la paz de la sociedad internacional sino preparar el ambiente internacional favorable a la agresion a ultramar abusando de esa posicion responsable de la ONU.
					
					Si Japon enloquecido por la expansion a ultramar alcanza su meta, caeran en riesgo la paz y la seguridad del mundo y se dara un disturbio en la sociedad internacional.
					
					Resulta tan ridiculo el intento de Japon de ocupar la posicion responsable de la ONU sin liquidar su pasado criminal.
					
					Le seria mas conveniente indemnizar sinceramente sus crimenes del pasado para conseguir la confianza de la sociedad internacional, al ver correctamente la corriente de la epoca y la aspiracion del pueblo.

articles.title: Creados himnos al Partido del Trabajo de Corea
articles.content:
Creados himnos al Partido del Trabajo de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En este ano significativo de la reeleccion del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il en el puesto cimero del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y de la celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, fueron creadas en Corea muchas canciones calificadas de obras maestras de la epoca.
					Reflejan la alabanza al partido de todos los militares y civiles las canciones "Gloria a nuestro gran partido", "El Partido es regazo del General", "Cantamos del partido" y "Adelante jovenes siguiendo al partido".
					
					La primera, repercutida altamente en las escenas conmemorativas de octubre dedicadas al dia de fundacion del PTC, es el eco de fidelidad de los verdaderos hombres que apoyan al partido confiandolo absolutamente.
					
					Si bien tiene una melodia y estrofas comunes, esta cancion conmueve tanto a la gente porque ha reflejado con mayor acierto el mundo espiritual del ejercito y el pueblo de la epoca del Songun.
					
					La segunda ha sido creada como himno de la revolucion del Songun en marzo pasado cuando todo el pais producia grandes y nuevos saltos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera en acato a las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					Por otra parte, en junio pasado fueron creadas "Fascinacion y veneracion" y "Cantamos del partido" en homenaje al 46o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el CC del PTC.
					
					"Adelante jovenes siguiendo al Partido" nacio en septiembre, cuando se efectuo la historica Conferencia del PTC, alegrando a los militares y civiles.
					
					Cantando estas canciones, el pueblo coreano renueva su conviccion de que gracias al gran PTC, prosperara mas la patria y se agrandaran sus felicidades.
